topBand.overlay: We are operating solely on your donation

bgImage.alt: image of boy in train car

info:
Like Theraveda Buddhist monks, we live by your contribution.  We build clinics, educate and support people with your donation.  Your generosity means a lot to us and the people in Myanmar.
We process your donation through the secure gateway of Paypal, worry-free.
Please help us support world health by clicking "Donate".
